ingredients: 2 tablespoons finely chopped red sweet pepper
1 tablespoon very finely chopped lemon grass (white portion only) or 1 teaspoon finely shredded lemon peel
1 tablespoon very finely chopped lemon grass (white portion only) or 1 teaspoon finely shredded lemon peel
1 13 1/2 ounce can unsweetened coconut milk (about 1-1/2 cups)
